# styled-components Units/Lessons

Contained within this repository are all the companion units (or lessons!) for learning more about CSS in JS with styled-components and React. See also [CSS in JS Training][css-in-js-training] for the companion website and content.

## Units

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (UNITS:include=^\d+-.*$) -->

- [Your First Styled Component](02-your-first-styled-component/README.md)
- [Traditional CSS](03-traditional-css/README.md)
- [Props Injection](04-prop-injection/README.md)
- [Inheritance and Composition](05-inheritance-and-composition/README.md)
- [Animation](06-animation/README.md)
- [Usage with Existing Libraries](07-usage-with-existing-libraries/README.md)
- [Injecting Globals](08-injecting-globals/README.md)
- [Theming](09-theming/README.md)
- [Server rendering](10-server-rendering/README.md)
- [Utility Libraries](11-utility-libraries/README.md)
- [Style objects](12-style-objects/README.md)
- [When Not to Use CSS in JS](13-when-not-to-use-css-in-js/README.md)
- [CSS Modules](14-css-modules/README.md)
- [Automated tooling](15-automated-tooling/README.md)
